metadata.synopsis: The caravan has come to a stop at Moonrise Towers. Gronag is one of the guards idling outside until they're sent back out into the dark.
metadata.how_to_trigger: loadlevel SCL_Main_Agod ongoto 34.386; 49.025; -22.433dilog is triggered'The absolute protected me''lantern''Thank you - let's go'follow them to the towerthe goblins will enter the tower for a drinkteleport S_SCL_DriderCaravan_GoblinMelee_001OR go to -133.496; 23.899; -190.94speak w Brawler Gronag

0.speaker: Warrior Gronag
0.text: Absolute's blessing on ya. Maybe Her design will throw us together again sometime.

1.speaker: Warrior Gronag
1.text: Look busy if y'can, True Soul. I hear the Disciple ain't long putting idle hands to work.
